system_requirements:
## Operating systems
 - iOS 11.4
 - iOS 12
 - iOS 13
 - iOS 14
text: Firefox fans rejoice! With the release of iOS 14 and the latest version of Firefox app, you can now set Firefox as your default mobile browser. And with Firefox widgets for your home screen, you can access your go-to actions even faster — like web search or opening your favorite sites.
title: Firefox for iOS 29.0 Release
